description: Performs execution of specified file, can be used for defensive evasion.
name: Suspicious Subsystem for Linux Bash Execution
query: ((process.command_line.text:*bash.exe* AND process.command_line.text:*\-c\ *) AND (NOT ((process.parent.command_line.text:(*C\:\\Program\ Files\\Git\\post\-install.bat* OR *C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Git\\post\-install.bat* OR *echo\ \/etc\/post\-install\/*.post*) OR process.command_line.text:*echo\ \/etc\/post\-install\/*.post*))))
author: frack113
